name: api_math_Matrix4x4

properties.name: decomposeProjection

properties.name: determinant
properties.description: The determinant of the matrix. (Read Only)

properties.name: inverse
properties.description: The inverse of this matrix. (Read Only)

properties.name: isIdentity
properties.description: Checks whether this is an identity matrix. (Read Only)

properties.name: lossyScale
properties.description: Attempts to get a scale value from the matrix. (Read Only)

properties.name: rotation
properties.description: Attempts to get a rotation quaternion from this matrix.

properties.name: transpose
properties.description: Returns the transpose of this matrix (Read Only).

properties.name: GetColumn
properties.description: Get a column of the matrix.

properties.name: GetPosition
properties.description: Get position vector from the matrix.

properties.name: GetRow
properties.description: Returns a row of the matrix.

properties.name: MultiplyPoint
properties.description: Transforms a position by this matrix (generic).

properties.name: MultiplyPoint3x4
properties.description: Transforms a position by this matrix (fast).

properties.name: MultiplyVector
properties.description: Transforms a direction by this matrix.

properties.name: SetColumn
properties.description: Sets a column of the matrix.

properties.name: SetRow
properties.description: Sets a row of the matrix.

properties.name: SetTRS
properties.description: Sets this matrix to a translation, rotation and scaling matrix.

properties.name: ToString
properties.description: Returns a formatted string for this matrix.

properties.name: TransformPlane
properties.description: Returns a plane that is transformed in space.

properties.name: ValidTRS
properties.description: Checks if this matrix is a valid transform matrix.
